gurmukhi: pRqMcnI Sbd ko Awid bKwnIAY ] ArxI qwky AMq Sbd ko TwnIAY ] skl qupk ky nwm jwn jIX lIjIAY ] ho kho inSMk sB Taur n gnqI kIjIAY ]1132]
transliteration: Pratanchanndshabad Ko Aadh Bakhaaneeai|| Arnitaake Ant Shabad Ko Thaaneeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Jaan Jeeya Leejeeai|| Ho Kaho Nishank Sabh Thaur Na Gadtikeejeeai||1132||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Pratyanchani”, add the word “arini” at the end and know all the names of Tupak.1132.

gurmukhi: S`qRu BMjix Awid bKwn ] irpu Sbdu bhuir pRmwn ] sB nwm qupk pCwn ] nih Byd Xw mih jwn ]1133]
transliteration: Shattru Bhanjan(i) Aadh Bakhaan|| Ripu Shabad(u) Bahur(i) Pramaan|| Sabh Naam Toupak Pachhaad|| Nah(i) Bhed Yaa Maih Jaan||1133||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Shatru-bhanjani”, add the word “Ripu” and know all the names of Tupak without any discrimination.1133.

gurmukhi: hirskqx pd Awid Bix`jY ] ArxI Sbd AMq iqh id`jY ] nwm qupk ky skl lhIjY ] jhI Tvr chIAY qh dIjY ]1134]
transliteration: Harisaktan Pad Aadh Bhanijjai|| Arnishabad Ant Tih Dijjai|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Laheejai|| Jahithavar Chaheeai Tah Deejai||1134||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Harishkitni”, add the word “arnini” at the end and know all the names of Tupak for using them as desired.1134.

gurmukhi: ibisK brsxI Awid aucwrx kIjIAY ] ArxI qwky AMq Sbd ko dIjIAY ] skl qupk ky nwm cqur jIX jwnIAY ] ho kwib kibq ky BIqr sdw pRmwnIAY ]1135]
transliteration: Bisikh Barsaniaadh Ouchaaran Keejeeai|| Arnitaake Ant Shabad Ko Deejeeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Chatur Jeeya Jaaneeai|| Ho Kaah(i) Kabit Ke Bheetar Sadaa Pramaaneeai||1135||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Vishkh-varshani”, add the word “arini” at the end and know all the names of Tupak in your mind.1135.

gurmukhi: bwn brKxI Awid aucrIAY ] ArxI Sbd AMq iqh DrIAY ] skl qupk ky nwm lhIjY ] ijh iqh Tvr BxIjY ]1136]
transliteration: Baan Barkhaniaadh Udareeai|| Arnishabad Ant Tih Dareeai|| Sakal Toupak Ke Naam Laheejai|| Jih Chaaho Tih Thavar Bhaneejai||1136||
translation: Saying firstly the word “Baan-varshani”, add the word “arini” at the end and know all the names of Tupak.1136.

gurmukhi: Awid bwnnI Sbdih BUl bKwnIAY ] ArxI qwky AMq Sbd ko TwnIAY ] nwm qupk ky skl jwn jIX lIjIAY ] ho jh cwho qh Sbd qhI qy dIjIAY ]1137]
transliteration: Aadh Baananishabadah(i) Bhool Bakhaaneeai|| Arnitaake Ant Shabad Ko Thaaneeai|| Naam Toupak Ke Sakal Jaan Jeea Leejeeai|| Ho Jah Chaaho Tah Shabad Tahite Deejeeai||1137||
translation: Saying firstly the wood “Baanani”, add the word “arini” at the end and know all the names of Tupak in your mind.1137.

gurmukhi: Awid pncnI Sbd bKwno ] mQxI Sbd AMq iqh Twno ] sB sRI nwm qupk ky lhIAY ] ruic jy jhIN qhIN qy khIAY ]1138]
transliteration: Aadh Panchanndshabad Bakhaano|| Mathanishabad Ant Tih Thaano|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Laheeai|| Rouch(i) Je Jahin Taheen Te Kaheeai||1138||
translation: Saying the word “Panchani”, add the word “Mathani” at the end and know all the names of Tupak for speaking them according to your inclination.1138.

gurmukhi: kovMfjnI Awid aucrIAY ] mQxI AMq Sbd iqh DrIAY ] sB sRI nwm qupk ky jwnhu ] jhw rucY qy qhI bKwnhu ]1139]
transliteration: Kovandjaniaadh Udareeai|| Mathaniant Shabadtih Dareeai|| Sabh Srinaam Toupak Ke Jaanoh|| Jahaa Rouchai Te Tahibakhaanoh||1139||
translation: Saying the word “Kovandjani” speak the word “mathani” at the end and know all the names of Tupak.1139.
